title: So not only lost lp, but also got placed in low Prio que because of the server mess up. Sick

replies.body:
Whelp, our servers certainly came down with a cold that's for sure {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} ....

Once we noticed our server issues, we brought down ranked play so that there weren't any unneeded casualties. However, rest assured that we're working as fast as we can to fix anything that may still be affecting our summoners.

Thanks for being patient ^_^!

The problem is that Riot didn't bring down ranked play well until _hours of the problem still occurring_, meaning that hundreds of not thousands of players have been affected by going into Ranked games only to be penalized by LP losses (sometimes multiple games), and Leaverbuster penalties -- then we're essentially told that we're "shit out of luck", simply because Riot took it's sweet time to enable loss prevention, and those of us who suffered _before_ it was enabled are left out in the cold.

is there any possible way to refresh the ones of us that got leavebustered because of this issue? or at least a small token of apology? ive been playing this game for 7 years and this is the first time i almost felt like never playing again
You guys need better detection. This is not the first time you've been slow to respond to server issues and outages, and it definitely won't be the last.

So you're telling me, that not only did the first person that said something about this about 30+ hours ago, but you just now disabled (based on your response) about 5-6 hours ago. Because I havent seen a single rioter comment on anything about this issue until now. 

Bonus: You are not going to fix the issues of lp loss, simply because you do not want to, or can not. Which either way is an error within its self.
